name: HomeAssistant
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen light”
”Alexa, set the living room light to 20%”
”Alexa, turn on the AC”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is meant for Home Assistant users. When logged into the Home Assistant cloud, you can control all your Home Assistant devices from any Alexa compatible device.

Turn your lights on, turn your TV off and enable automations.
